content.raw:
I just looked at the API's in this PR, and I doubt many plugins are using them, so I've approved.

Thinking ahead slightly, we are deprecating lots of `gazebo::math`, and I know that is definitely used all over in `gazebo_ros_pkgs` and `drcsim`. Also, it's not a huge leap to think that some ROS users will jump multiple versions of gazebo (2 in indigo, 5 in jade, 7 in K turtle?).

I'll revisit this argument if there are specific API's that are more problematic to remove. These look fine.
